ping_pong.name: Ping Pong
ping_pong.desc: A classic ping pong game. Player 1 uses keys A & D to move the paddle. Player 2 uses keys J & L to move the paddle. Optionally, one or both of the players can be computer controlled. Select the game mode by pressing number 1, 2 or 3 on the title screen.

snake_demo.name: Snake Game Prototype
snake_demo.desc: Early prototype of a snake game implemented with circular buffers. There is currently no collision detecting or food for the snake. Use the arrow keys to steer the snake.

space_invaders_demo.name: Space Invaders Prototype
space_invaders_demo.desc: Early prototype demonstrating the drawing and shifting of the sprites for a space-invaders style game. There are no controls for this demo.

shape_test.name: Shape Drawing Test
shape_test.desc: A continually-looping test of the square and circle drawing functions from the standard library. There are no controls for this demo.

kerning_test.name: Character Drawing Test
kerning_test.desc: A demonstration of the aesthetic advantages of drawing characters with proper spacing (kerning) over fixed spacing (monospace). However, the time consuming nature of this method can be seen by watching how fast the monospace rendering is by comparison.
